FuncDef: The display telemetry destination command displays information about a destination group to which the data sampled is sent. The display telemetry destination command displays information about a destination group to which the data sampled is sent.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the name of a destination group to which the data sampled is sent.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters containing letters and digits. Spaces are not supported between letters or digits.

ExtraInfo: To view destination group information, such as the name, IP address, port number and its connection status, and transport protocol, run the display telemetry destination command.
